templateMDtTableSql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_dw.dw_error_report_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
                                    `app_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `app_version_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `channel_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '渠道ID',
                                    `app_plat_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '应用类型ID',
                                    `country_id` MEDIUMINT (9) DEFAULT NULL,
                                    `region_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `carrier_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `connect_type_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `network_type_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `os_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `os_version_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `device_type` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `device_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL,
                                    `manufacturer_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `manufacturer_model_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
                                    `message_id` BIGINT (255) NOT NULL COMMENT '崩溃信息ID',
                                    `year` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900' COMMENT '年',
                                    `month` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月',
                                    `day` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '日',
                                    `hour` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小时',
                                    `error_type` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL COMMENT '崩溃类型',
                                    `error_level` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '崩溃类型等级:0：高，1：中，2：低',
                                    `error_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL  COMMENT '错误次数',
                                    INDEX `idx_dwd_error_report_date` (`year`, `month`, `day`),
                                    INDEX `idx_dwd_error_report_range` (`statis_date`)
                                ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insertMDtSelectSql:
INSERT INTO bi_dw.dw_error_report_dm_yyyymm (
	                                `statis_date`,
									`app_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									`channel_id`,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`country_id`,
									`region_id`,
									`carrier_id`,
									`connect_type_id`,
									`network_type_id`,
									`os_id`,
									`os_version_id`,
									`device_type`,
									`device_id`,
									`manufacturer_id`,
									`manufacturer_model_id`,
									`message_id`,
									`year`,
									`month`,
									`day`,
									`hour`,
									`error_type`,
									`error_level`,
									`error_count`
								) SELECT
								    `store_id` as statis_date,
									`app_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									`channel_id`,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`country_id`,
									`region_id`,
									`carrier_id`,
									`connect_type_id`,
									`network_type_id`,
									`os_id`,
									`os_version_id`,
									`device_type`,
									`device_id`,
									`manufacturer_id`,
									`manufacturer_model_id`,
									`message_id`,
									`year`,
									`month`,
									`day`,
									`hour`,
									`error_type`,
									`error_level`,
									count(1) as error_count
								FROM
									bi_dwd.dwd_error_report_dm_yyyymm
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND `store_id` = ${store_id}
								group by `app_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									`channel_id`,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`country_id`,
									`region_id`,
									`carrier_id`,
									`connect_type_id`,
									`network_type_id`,
									`os_id`,
									`os_version_id`,
									`device_type`,
									`device_id`,
									`manufacturer_id`,
									`manufacturer_model_id`,
									`message_id`,
									`year`,
									`month`,
									`day`,
									`hour`,
									`error_type`,
									`error_level`,
									`store_id`
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_dw.dw_error_report_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND statis_date = ${statisDate}
delete_date: delete from bi_dw.dw_error_report_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND statis_date < ${statisDate}
